titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Army Dental Corps on its 100th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
3/15/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the Army Dental Corps on its 100th anniversary.
Commends the Corps for its work to improve the dental readiness of the Army and the oral health of soldiers and their families.
Recognizes the thousands of dentists who have served in the Corps over the last 100 years.
